Html:
I need to inherit from a configuration section base class located in a different assembly (referenced by the Configuration section project).

The designer currently only allows for selecting base classes that are part of the same CSD file (e.g. ConfigurationSection.csd). How could I accomplish this other than manually editing the base class in ConfigurationSection.csd.cs?

Thanks in advance.
